website_summaries.verdict: This effective iron's useful features and nice steam output will make easy work of your ironing chores.
pros: Boasts steam channels and a wide soleplate for exact wrinkle removal
cons: Steam button is fiddly and occasionally sticks

customer_reviews.title: It is a used iron!!
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked to find that the iron delivered had been used!! there are water drops on the surface of the water tank. When I open the tank and double-checked, it is wet!!!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: A good iron. Almost 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this iron after reading the reviews. The iron is very good. I have been a member of the British Army in the past, and a good iron is essential when getting ready for inspection. The iron is very good, but for my large hands it is easy to alter the temperature setting when lifting the iron. It does carry out its function well in use, and the long power cord is very good. I was surprised that it doesn't come with a filling jug, but it has a large opening for filling the water tank. If the temperature dial were a little tighter it would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J Holmes

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, I researched irons until I was blue in the face, and this one came up trumps every time. I was sceptical because it wasn't expensive but the proof of the pudding is in the eating. No it doesn't make puddings, it's an expression.
customer_reviews.author: HotScot

customer_reviews.title: Second iron broke in a space of a few weeks! Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the iron, steam button broke. Got replacement, it broke again. Fuming! How difficult is it to make an iron that does not break? It's not a space rocket, for goodness sake!
customer_reviews.author: Yulia D

customer_reviews.title: Wet
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely great, apart from the one we got kept leaking water from the steam vents. It would leave big blobs of water over the clothes, splashing out from the front when changing direction of the iron. It then started leaving puddles underneath itself when stored in an upright position, so when have returned it. Possibly it faulty, seemed to be more than one of the steam vents causing the issue so it might also be a design fault.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic soleplate makes ironing less of a chore and is very easy to fill
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this iron in January 2016 and I absolutely LOVE it. It produces a good amount of steam and the 180g shot of steam is brilliant for getting stubborn creases out. The 3 metre cable is plenty long enough for my needs and the swivel mechanism saves the cable twisting as you use the iron in different directions. It's also very easy to fill and the smooth non-stick ceramic soleplate makes ironing quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Southam

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous plug
customer_reviews.text: Good product but very dangerously fitted plug! After first use the back of the plug pulled off as I was removing from the power source, this left the exposed live cable and fuse! Had to isolate the whole power circuit from the board in the house! I'm not happy at all this is very dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Don Ross

customer_reviews.title: Good overall iron
customer_reviews.text: As a person that hates ironing I took a punt on this iron based on the reviews after my previous iron died a death. The iron is good has a big plate and a big water container also the cable very long.. The down side is the iron heavy when full of water which I don't mind but some people may not. Its dead easy to use, has an anti calc button... The one thing I really don't like is the design it's a bit bizzare it's the sort of iron Kim Kardashian would have.... If she ever ironed in her life.... Which make me hate ironing even more as I think of her every time I start to iron
customer_reviews.author: lakes walker

customer_reviews.title: Damaged items
customer_reviews.text: I have received two of these items from amazon both showing the wires where the sole plate does not meet the top part, given that this is a steam iron and water will get into the main body I was advised not to use the iron and return them as they were not safe and fit for purpose. I do not know if the items were damaged and I was just unlucky but if there is a gap between the sole plate and the top part then the iron should not be used
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lovely steam iron.........
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed was the length of cable compared to my last Iron, the ease of use and amount of steam it produces. I now enjoy doing the ironing it's a lot lighter and glides over the articles. The only issue with this iron is the control dial which I tend to knock/move sometimes when I go to hold or let go of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: KENTSUE

customer_reviews.title: Glides effortlessly
customer_reviews.text: Best iron I've had in a long while. Very comfortable grip, and glides lovely. Good size opening for refilling with water. It's great to be able to adjust the steam intensity. I like the indicator that shows you when iron is up to temperature. Long power cord too. It was a pleasure to do my ironing for once. Looks good, nice colour and made well.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Henney

customer_reviews.title: The ironing angel
customer_reviews.text: After the sad demise of my previous iron I was distraught - unlike many, I love ironing - gives me a chance to think and listen to music - but I'm retired so time is not a factor! Iron does exactly what it said in the description. Another reviewer thought it was a heavy iron - I don't. I like the pivoting flex which prevents getting kinks and the steam is more than adequate for jeans etc. A very good product at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Quality iron for low price
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a few irons in the past and this is by far the easiest and most sufficient one yet. Still can't believe how cheap it was for the quality! Glad I purchased this one, I don't mind leaving the ironing board out now either, the style is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mads193

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: I haven't bought a new iron for over 10 years so wasn't sure what to expect. It's quite a heavy iron and gave me a blister after a while...but I do let my ironing pile up. I often knock the dial out of place but my hands and I didn't think my hands were that large. Saying that it heats up well, irons very well. A good amount of steam comes out of it. I like the temperature light, nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs D Bevington

customer_reviews.title: Good and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: A good iron. Settings are easy to understand and the iron light up to indicate certain features. The only thing i would say is that i think the base could have been a bit bigger as it feels like the iron may tip over. However still a good iron and value for money.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: SECOND HAND, USED IRON. CONTAINS WATER!
customer_reviews.text: This is the SECOND time Amazon have sent me a second hand USED iron. The previous one also had water inside it and blew my electric when I plugged it in and I had to call out an Electrician!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived used
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived used. The sole plate has scratches and marks. The tank also has been filled with water. Also the iron arrived in only the manufacturers box, not dispatch not or advice on how to return. Really disappointed as I used my Prime membership so it was delivered quickly!! Absolutely shocked that it was not pristine brand new or in appropriate packaging to enable me to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good iron
customer_reviews.text: The performance of this iron is ok. The steam enough to get good results and lightweight. In my opinion this is an average product in the range of steam irons but great for the price. The diamonds design around the body of the iron is of a bad taste. Looks like cheap printed plastic. I have been using a Rowenta Steam Force Made in Germany and got a bit spoiled about its fantastic performance. But, of course, this comes from a different league.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Makes ironing (almost) a joy.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t enjoy ironing at all - I loathe it. To the point where I don’t usually do it! (Unless husband has a special meeting at work and needs to look presentable 😂) However, I’m hooked! I didn’t really believe the extent of its greatness from the other rave reviews, but can honestly advise you to believe them. It makes ironing (almost) a joy - quick, easy, and amazing results. Really powerful with high wattage, and looks quite good too. Thumbs up from me.
customer_reviews.author: Gael B.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect iron...finally
customer_reviews.text: I never really write reviews on here, however felt compelled as this iron is pretty awesome. The diamond coating is true to its word and not a marketing tact. This together with jow the placements of the steam holes have been engineered definitely help with creases, more than any other iron we have owned. It glides over fabric and has enough weight to reduce the amount of effort. It feels like it's well made and has plenty of finishing touches which set this iron way apart from the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Munir Dahya

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I can't comment on its durability as I've only just received it but at the moment I'm kicking myself for not buying this iron sooner. It's fantastic..not too heavy, beautifully smooth, and ironed bone dry linen without a problem and then a tutu I'd bought for my granddaughter and which had arrived very creased. 100% recommended!
customer_reviews.author: PennyS

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this iron for the odd thing to iron as I have a steam press which l use for bulky loads. I find l prefer the iron to the press as it so quick to heat up and does a superb job on collars and cuffs with an impressive blast of steam when needed and glides effortlessly on all types of material. Jeans and shirts are a doodle and even sheets which are a faff are quickly smoothed. Overall the best iron I've ever had . Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: mrs marie cane

customer_reviews.title: Breville iron
customer_reviews.text: The steam button on this lasted about a wee, now it sticks down and is annoying to use.. I'm still considering whether to return the iron for a refund, it has a good long cord and large water capacity which is why I bought It over other models, but. I wouldn't recommend it I'm afraid.
customer_reviews.author: keairou

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I got this as it looks attractive and I wanted a plate that wouldn’t stick, and do far so good. Didn’t have any problems with dial. It did leak a bit at first but seems to be ok when turned up high
customer_reviews.author: mrst66

customer_reviews.title: Great steam iron
customer_reviews.text: Great value steam iron. This replaced a steam generator iron and thought that it wouldn't get near that one on the amount of steam it could produce, but I was wrong. Lots of steam, light and well balanced and heats up so quick. The only negative is i keep hitting the heat control with my finger and have to keep re adjusting the temperature, but at this price a very small negative issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lee R

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after my old Bosch broke yesterday. Came next day with prime thank goodness. Fantastic iron, great steam on it and you can adjusted the steam output. Fast heat up. Its a nice heavy iron, seems well built and glides great. Gets all the creases out with a once over. I’d seen previous reviews saying there had been used before they received it because the tank was wet But mine got delivered and looked all wet in the tank but turns out it’s got circles on the tank and it was slight wet as it was condensation.
customer_reviews.author: Sleight89

customer_reviews.title: Powerful steaming
customer_reviews.text: A very good iron but heavier than I thought it would be. The steaming is very powerful and it actually gets out creases unlike other irons. One problem I would say I have and it could just be me I tend to move the dial inadvertently while ironing which could be a problem if working on a delicate fabric and thus turning up the heat too much. The water container has a greater capacity than other irons but then because of the powerful steam uses more water. On the whole a great iron!
customer_reviews.author: mw8811

customer_reviews.title: So excited
customer_reviews.text: This iron was a long time coming. I didn’t realise how bad mines was until I used this and sped through my ironing pile much quicker than usual. Excellent burst of steam, smooth and glides like everything is silk. On the highest setting this iron does get very steamy and the water goes quickly. Aesthetically pleasing iron with a rose Gold plate. Lovely finishing touches and for the price....well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent iron
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy, but fantastic iron, love it, long cord which is great, and irons really really well, I’d say its the best iron I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Trudi

customer_reviews.title: replacement improving effect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in prompt time. Bought by design ignoring the bad reviews didnt deter from purchasing as my mothers old one packed in,little skeptical at first,but surpassed any doubts,precision tip swift in all directions,delivers stunning high performance, just what doctor ordered ideal glidability and durability smooth touch brisk ironing control,quality look and sufficient accuracy. Very stylish model worthy value mid priced range compared to some exceeding over budget.
customer_reviews.author: Martinlawrencecocksedge

customer_reviews.title: Leaking brown liquid on my clothes!
customer_reviews.text: From the first use it leaks a brown liquid and has ruined my clothes! I tried rinsing out the water well and drying it and leaving it open and empty it after every use, but it has a brown liquid at the start of my ironing every time! Really wish I'd returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible -  do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this iron - pretty much the worst i’ve ever bought. I have to iron everything under a tea towel as it constantly leaves black marks that won’t wash out. After a few uses the ironing plate is covered in black marks that won’t clean off and it’s really only useable without the steam function. So disappointed with this iron as my previous Breville was fab.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Loving this iron. Smooth plate makes ironing easier. Long lead means I have been able to ditch combersome extension. Easy to fill water container and plenty of steam when required. A little heavier than old iron but that was a small budget version and the weight is not a factor as plate glides over fabric.
customer_reviews.author: kismetk8

customer_reviews.title: Steam button breaks really quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was really pleased with this iron and gave it a glowing review! Unfortunately things took a turn! The steam button broke within 6 months, and the steam is the star of the show! Got a replacement one from amazon and the steam button on that one broke after 5 weeks of light use and I returned it after speaking to Amazon customer service! It’s really disappointing as this is a really good iron without the steam button issues. I would avoid this iron as it is not durable at all. Your money is better sent elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nenz

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I am worried that I am so thrilled with this iron! After my last iron thankfully broke I spent a lot of time researching replacement possibilities. Top of the list was to make sure it had a decent length cord (unlike my last iron) and that immediately ruled out quite a few models. I eventually decided on this Breville PressXpress and can't believe how quickly I get through ironing now! I am very happy but sad that I am at the stage in life where an iron can excite me!
customer_reviews.author: jg

customer_reviews.title: Either Amazon or Breville are negligent
customer_reviews.text: Many other bad reviews are about receiving a USED unit. At least one describes the plate not being attached properly to the body of the unit thus being potentially dangerous as wires are visible. I received the same. Probably the one the reviewer sent back. Either Breville is negligent or Amazon. If it's Amazon, they should concentrate less on their advertising about their great packing warehouse staff and more on training their staff to send out NEW goods and not dangerous goods! Would love to have reviewed the product but don't trust Amazon to send a non-dangerous NEW one! Will return, no doubt so some other sucker will receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Dupont

customer_reviews.title: Rotating dial design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Great iron. Does exactly what it is meant to do. Only given 4 star rating because every time I pick up the iron I catch the rotating temperature dial. Because it turns so easily I keep altering the temperature unintentionally meaning I have to reset it every time I pick it up. Something Breville may want to look at in future design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Ironing
customer_reviews.text: My previous iron was beginning to die on me so after lots of research I decided to purchase this. I'm so glad I did, it makes ironing a breeze! I always thought my old iron was good but this is so much better, I'm very impressed. The steam shot it brilliant for stubborn creases, and it's practically halved the time it takes to iron a basket full of laundry. It does get very hot so just be careful not to use on synthetics before turning down the temperature. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Best iron I've bought.
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews on things I order on Amazon, however this product deserves one. I have gone through probably half a dozen irons in the last 5 years, and they'd never last or were just plain rubbish. This iron is brilliant!! I literally have no negative comments I could make about it. I've had it a couple of months now and honestly it's the best iron I've had. Beating the 80-100£ ones I've gone through thinking I had to spend alot of money to get something decent!!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Turner

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed views of this iron. On the very first item I ironed a button from an expensive T-shirt got caught in a gap above the hot plate and was only released when it melted. I’ve used the iron for two months now. It does occasionally leak water but it’s not done that so much recently. It irons quite well. On its hottest setting you can clearly see the water in the tank going down. (I don’t use that setting).
customer_reviews.author: Mr Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with my purchase great iron
customer_reviews.text: Been personally using the iron for the past 3 weeks as my mother in law has not been able to come around to do the ironing. Very happy with my purchase. Smooth lightweight long cord great steam and irons like a dream. Looks like I will say bye to my old Phil. ...oops can't say that. Jokes aside terrific iron delighted with the results. I bet so will u!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was NOT new!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy! Bought a brand new iron but when received it was NOT new. It had water in the chamber, and water Mark's on the outside where you fill it up. Had blsck mark's on the white plastic, and someone had taken a chunk out of the actual plate. Hence to say it was returned the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This Breville iron is a pleasure to use. It is on the heavy side but that is what I wanted and expected. I don't like lightweight irons - they feel cheap and nasty. This feels like a quality iron and is perfect. I cannot recommend it highly enough. Please be aware that it will have evidence of water droplets when you receive it. That DOES NOT mean it has been used - just tested before leaving the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J

customer_reviews.title: Small problem not unsolveable!
customer_reviews.text: A good iron. Does what an iron should do. Unfortunately the shot of steam button has broken due to a small clip, which holds the button in place, breaking under pressure from my wife's thumb. I would like a replacement iron asap please Breville. I would see this as a future problem for you that button only goes two ways, up and down. Meanwhile back at the board, the ironing is piling up!
customer_reviews.author: Chronoman

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: I was very dissappointed with the item. It was very heavy to handle and when ironing on delicate fabrics obviously with the correct heat setting it would drag the fabric and not glide through as expected. I should have really sent it back. Had it in the sale definetly not worth the sale price let alone the original price. Shame because it looks so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing experience
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product because I like chunky irons with plenty of weight, and in the pictures this one looked substantial with good reviews. Unfortunately when I received it there was already water in the tank, so I suspect that it may have been a returned product. Worst still, there was no way I could get it to generate even a single puff of steam. 2 stars overall rather than none because the seller managed my return and refund quickly and without quibble, but I was still disappointed at being obliged to return the iron then buy elsewhere, having bought what I expected to be a reliable branded product.
customer_reviews.author: baggyfan

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a shame for a lovely looking iron. Unfortunately within a month from purchase, the steam button broke where it stuck down and was unable to come back up. Managed to get a replacement despite being outside tbe return window which inwas very grateful for but then only to find just over a week from delivery of my replacement, the exact same thing happened again. So disappointed and will be requesting full refund, won't even bother with yet another replacement as Clearly this is a manufacturing issue.
customer_reviews.author: Reena

customer_reviews.title: Everything I need in an iron.
customer_reviews.text: Very much appreciate the extra long flex- a good feature. Makes life much easier,as does the large opening for pouring in the water for the steam option. I also like the indicator on the side of the plate to show when the iron is cool enough to store away.Cannot fault this iron.Well made and does what I want it to.Who needs more? Just not overkeen on the colour!
customer_reviews.author: cradoc

customer_reviews.title: Can’t withstand it’s own temperatures
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this iron can’t withstand its own temperatures. This is less than a year old and the paint is peeling
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful iron
customer_reviews.text: Lovely iron, filling up with water can be hard if you don’t shut the top properly because it dribbles out. It irons beautifully though, and takes half the time of our old inefficient iron. It glides over all materials and had a large plate to cut down time. Nice colour and attractive design, is definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: NicolaPash

customer_reviews.title: Dread Ironing?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son and, tested it out myself to make sure it was a good one and I have to say that I'll probably replace mine when/if my old one (hopefully not any time soon) ever packs in. Anyhoos, he says it's easy to use, great too and would recommend! - and thats about all I can tell you really :D
customer_reviews.author: Love my Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Iron
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic iron for the money! I’ve brought iron’s in the past that have just leaked water and made ironing incredibly difficult! This iron is the exact opposite. It heats up quickly and has a pointed tip so gets in all the tough areas of clothing. Only thing I would say is that it’s heavier than what I expected it to be. But I would 100% recommend to a friend!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Hot and steamy
customer_reviews.text: Love this iron so easy to use and effective - I had previous model that had NO temperature dial and was useless so was very apprehensive but this one is amazing and looks good too
customer_reviews.author: TerrieB

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Iron
customer_reviews.text: Always used steam generator irons before this but they only seem to last a couple of years. Bought this doubtful it would be as good but it totally is - I prefer it. Steam generators are expensive, for the price this iron is great. Yes you have to fill it more often than a generator but it is easy to fill. Yes it is heavier than a steam generator but the weight of the iron means the ironing takes less time as the weight helps smooth out the wrinkles in the clothes. Will never buy a steam generator again. I Can recommend this iron. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Julie. R

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say much about the iron as I have not used it but noted the large gap between the plate and the iron itself, which others have mentioned. I agree that this is a safety concern and probably a production issue. The iron I received also contained water droplets and had a dirty wire so blatantly a return. Very poor.
customer_reviews.author: swiss

customer_reviews.title: Shamazing Iron
customer_reviews.text: I’m someone who used to hate ironing until I tried this beast out! Wow what a difference it makes. I’ve tried normal irons & a b*sch steam generator but will use this one over those anyday! Don’t look or keep reading reviews.....just buy it, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent steam iron, best I've used and a great price
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy Which? Best buys but this wasn't listed. Other reviews sounded positive so for the price thought it was worth trying. Have to say best iron I've used and better than the Philips Which? Best Buy. Steam generation is excellent for shirts, however does mean the water chamber needs refilling regularly.
customer_reviews.author: RichB

customer_reviews.title: Ironings a pleasure now
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this, thought I was rubbish at ironing and now realise my old one was a dinosaur. Very way to use, my clothes are 100% better. One little snag, I keep catching the thermostat control when I pick it up, but that's only a minor irritation
customer_reviews.author: mrs janet lewis

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and design but there are a few problems. 1) it leaves tiny droplets when ironing with the steam turned on 2) I have also noticed tiny water droplets on the iron table when this iron is standing. I can’t see where the water is leaking. I wouldn’t recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Good iron
customer_reviews.text: Good iron , however it’s easy to knock the temperature control whilst using , also the steam button gets jammed every now and then which is frustrating, If I had been more organised I would have asked for a replacement as it’s it only major downside! looks lovely and the weight is good as it’s not too heavy , it’s easy to fill .
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Good iron (and for quilters)
customer_reviews.text: This iron was a little heavier than I expected but it doesn’t feel like it when you actual iron. It glides over cloth very smoothly and has good temperature control and steam. For quilters, the heft helps getting the fabric flat and the point is just right for pressing seams
customer_reviews.author: CAB

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good solid iron that looks great too
customer_reviews.text: Love this product - irons everything a treat !!! Good broad plate go gets through everything well - appreciate the wide water filling opening. My old iron had a clip for storing the cable on itself this one doesn’t- it’s the only thing I can say is missing - I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: hamill clawson

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months use.......Leaky
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews prior to buying and was concerned about some of the reviews saying it leaked. I bought it anyway as most of the reviews were good. The problem is the excessive leaking. If using steam it always drips water out onto the clothing, regardless of how long you leave it to warm up, or how hot you turn the dial. We bought this in July 18, it started out okay, with occasionally spitting out water but now it continuously leaks. Very disappointing as otherwise a great iron.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C.W.Berks

customer_reviews.title: Good iron
customer_reviews.text: I decided to wait till I try it couple of times: Pros: - as the power is high....3100W ...it gets hot fast making it easy to iron fast and effectively. - few reviews talked about it's weight....I see that as a pro, because the weight does help in getting clothes ironed...it is a con though for disabled people. - water tank capacity is not bad, didn't refill yet after ironing twice. Cons: - the only con I experienced is the temperature setting wheel can get easily readjusted while you are moving you hand on and off the handle. Didn't use the vertical steam....so no comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: neveen shaban

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very please with this iron. Great steam power easy to use. It does a great job on shirts and jeans. Good for all types of fabric. Easy to top up water and smooth over any fabric you are ironing. Well worth the money you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic girl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing iron. Long cord, large water compartment, big sole plate. Glides over clothes and isn’t heavy, though reviews said it was. Cut my ironing time down. Love it ! Thank you Breville and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Overall I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This iron is much heavier than my previous one but I soon got used to the weight and found, on the plus side, I no longer needed to press hard to achieve a good finish. The iron has a long lead and, for me, a sufficiently large water reservoir. My one complaint is that the temperature dial is easily moved whilst you are ironing, for instance when you change hands, and has to be readjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This iron is definitely worth the money. I replaced my old iron which was a hand me down and wasnt very effective anymore. This iron is really easy to use and control the temperature and steam settings. Glides perfectly on the clothing. It feels a little heavy and chunky but its bigger than my previous iron so takes a bit of getting used to. Great if you dont want to spend loads on a steam iron, definitely value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Normally I buy a more expensive irons but they never seem to last so going on reviews I bought this one . Very good iron and id day better then the more expensive ones I’ve bought in the past, so if your after a descent iron I’d go for this one you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Iron
customer_reviews.text: I am basically quite happy with the iron. My biggest problem is the weight, especially when it has water in for steaming. After every use my wrist is very sore and am unable to lift or pick up anything heavy such as kettle. I don't dislike the iron it does a great job, it is the weight of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: At last, an iron with a cord long enough so it doesn't unplug when using it!!! MASSIVE cord, which is why to be honest, I bought it. However, this steam iron, although quite heavy is brilliant, one of the best I have used. Easy to fill too and does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Used/faulty item delivered
customer_reviews.text: Used item delivered. Box was broken and I can see water droplets in the chamber. Further, on operating the iron the steam flow is intermittent and clearly this item is faulty/refurbished and delivered to me for the price of new. Also, I paid extra for one day delivery and it all seems very useless.
customer_reviews.author: Harsh

customer_reviews.title: Good but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Heaviest iron I have ever owned. The temperature dial turns with little resistance so regularly gets knocked by mistake, I minor irritation! This iron has a large water tank which is handy and it does iron well, I'd say it irons better than any iron I've used before.
customer_reviews.author: motorspiritmover

customer_reviews.title: Very good if moderates
customer_reviews.text: Good ironing, good steaming , good length of cable, my problem with the plug, it’s a plastic, so if you drop it accidentally Then there is a good chance you will break it, also it gets hot from use.
customer_reviews.author: Razaq

customer_reviews.title: Great iron ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Far better than my old iron. very happy with my purchase - saw lots of people commenting it had water in it when it arrived - YES!! of course because its been tested! Doesn't come with a filling cup but easy to do from the tap or just use a jug - easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great iron to use ,great results
customer_reviews.text: I love this iron the steam is powerful I've just ironed all new bedding which always is difficult wow every crease is out .l had many irons over the years so l wanted a make l had never tried so l decided on Breville as l love my big slice sandwich maker .l would recommend this iron to everyone very happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: The perfect iron
customer_reviews.text: This is the best iron you could buy!! It's really good. The steam is hot as hell, and I normally just put my clothes on a hanger and steam it I was soo amazed to watch all the creases just fade away. It glides on clothes when ironing on a ironing board. It's the best investment for the house my last iron was dead and didn't seem to get any creases out. So from that to this is regal!!!! Loool trust me, grab thissssss
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and very powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement...A very powerful iron. Nice design and easy to use with a very efficient self-clean facility but as it is my wife who does the ironing I can only go by what she tells me and that is that she is very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Delzx7r

customer_reviews.title: Decent iron
customer_reviews.text: Really decent iron. I find it really easy to use. Makes short work of my work cloths and the settings are really clear for different materials. Even had a tab that shows when it's cooled down and safe to put away. Only thing to mention is my partner finds it a but on the heavy side but she still uses it too.
customer_reviews.author: Fenrir

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: great iron at a great price, glides easily heats up quickly good steam and good size water tank, a little on the heavy side but not unduly so, on the whole a good buy
customer_reviews.author: brian attwood

customer_reviews.title: Great first impression
customer_reviews.text: I've used it once so far, I dithered over iron selection but this did a great job I'm pleased with my purchase, great for a cheaper iron as you can spend way more! good steam levels and easy to iron shirts.
customer_reviews.author: C. Southcott

customer_reviews.title: Leaky!
customer_reviews.text: Two years old and it has been leaking water when in steam mode (temperature high), and this has got worse over time. Like some others, the silvery cover of the front point has started peeling off. A bit tacky looking. Really good feature is the automatic cut out which was why I chose it and which has always worked
customer_reviews.author: Julie F.

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Temperature dial too easy to turn and it’s hard not to accidentally change the temperature while ironing. No cord management and the 3-pin plug won’t last as made of hard, brittle looking plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: Not new
customer_reviews.text: The iron was clearly used and had a scratch on the sole plate. The warranty had a sticker attached noting the iron is a factory second and the warranty is void.
customer_reviews.author: Davey53

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger than the last one I had and heavier. The cable is quite hard at the moment and makes moving the iron a even harder but I think with time it'll gain more flexibility. I'm quite happy as cut my normal ironing time by half and with good results. The iron has controllable steam which helps to iron even faster. No faults at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Esperanza

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and steam is either off or full on...
customer_reviews.text: For an iron is incredibly heavy. I didn't think it would matter but it actually makes your wrist a bit tired when ironing a lot. But the biggest problem with it and why it only gets 3 stars is that the steam control looks like it should have multiple levels but in fact is pretty much on or off - so you're either dry ironing or going through a bottle of ironing water every session!
customer_reviews.author: LvL

customer_reviews.title: Steam iron
customer_reviews.text: Have brought previous irons for the past 40 years at a cheaper price, and have last very well. Used this for the second time and steam button broken already. NOT good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Used item/sent back
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied.The steam iron came used,even like this they didn't bother cleaning . Payment was done for a new/unused Steam Iron. Returned on the same day
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous iron with only one small flaw
customer_reviews.text: Great iron, easy glider, good steam. Only the position / sensitivity of the temperature regulation dial is a little unfortunate, as you easily touch it and therefore change the setting unintentionally when grabbing the handle. Apart from that it’s a fab iron and I don’t regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: JaySL

customer_reviews.title: Good ironing experience
customer_reviews.text: The temperature control dial is too easy to change, Great iron for me, chord length very good, weight slightly heavy but that is a positive too. Tank easy to fill and overall a very good iron.
customer_reviews.author: John Whites

customer_reviews.title: Leaks water
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this iron as it leaks water rather delivering steam. It even leaks when the steam setting is off. I gave it a star which was earned by the fact it is a reasonable weight and has a nice pointed tip
customer_reviews.author: Mike Moors

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the weight put you off
customer_reviews.text: Needs filling up quickly and I personally feel Its quite heavy - everyone is different when it comes to weight, don't let this put you off because it is a brilliant steam iron, even brilliant when not using the steam setting. Gets the creases out perfectly. Wire is very long too which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this iron. The buttons are easy to reach and use. Its very easy to fill. The sole plate is large and I sail through the ironing so it has become a pleasure not a chore. I suffer with arthritis in my hands and my hands are small, but this iron us perfect. I thoroughly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B. Hills

customer_reviews.title: New but has water in 😡
customer_reviews.text: Like someone already said in one of the reviews it has water in, it supose to be brand new. It looks like it has been used. I have just received it so cannot comment on performance
customer_reviews.author: Guerin

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: My old iron gave up after a few years of good service so I looked for ease of use, good make and competitive pricing. I found all my needs met with this product. Well packaged and great delivery. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Roger Cordey

customer_reviews.title: Beware this product may leak water.
customer_reviews.text: This Breville steam iron was faulty and had to be sent back. In my view it was dangerous mainly due to the fact that the water tank leaked and that is not good for any electric appliance. I replaced it with a Philips which gets my approval.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Devlin

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish do not buy it
customer_reviews.text: One of the steam button stopped working after using it only for one month It’s not light it’s heavy as rock I do not see the difference between cheap iron and this one
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Excellent iron
customer_reviews.text: This iron is brilliant. Quick to heat up, excellent steam, not too heavy, great flex length. An excelleny buy, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hall

customer_reviews.title: Poor buttons will fail
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic iron with all the gadgets but we have had two of these now in less than 9 months. The steam button fails on this and leaves you unable to fire a shot of steam, all be it intermitent at first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fab iron, does the job quickly, very stylish as well
customer_reviews.text: Lovely stylish iron, motors through work shirts and bedding, excellent steam power, great price for how great it is very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Louise 123

product_meta.title: Breville VIN339 Press Xpress Steam Iron, 180g Steam Shot, Multi-Directional Ceramic Soleplate, 2800W
product_meta.description:
Style Name:VIN339 - PurpleBreville Press Xpress Steam Iron

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Breville Press Xpress Iron; 1 x Instruction Booklet
feature_bullets: Super wide premium ceramic finish soleplate which is multi directional for speed and agility.
180g steam shot powers through tough creases with ease and leaves a super smooth finish
Steam channels & detail tip for steam where you want it
Large 400ml easy view water tank & and comfort grip handle with up-to-temperature illumination
Automatic shut off, anti-drip, anti-scale, self-clean feature & extra long 3m power cord and has a mains plug

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,435 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
